description:
A fast, fun and stimulating object to object mapper.  Kind of like AutoMapper, just simpler and way, way faster.  
Fpr maps by convention with zero work if your objects are similar, performs projections and flattening, but also supports configuration for more complex scenarios.

title: Fpr Mapper
